content: Pinocchio's only fault was that he had too many friends. Among these were many well-known rascals, who cared not a jot for study or for success.
translations: ita:L'unica colpa di Pinocchio era che aveva troppi amici. Tra questi c'erano molti mascalzoni ben noti, che non si curavano
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
